snippet: Representative Paul D. Ryan, the candidate for vice president, has learned that added scrutiny can turn even marathons and mountains into treacherous topics.
abstract: Rep Paul D Ryan is attempting to adapt to the high level of scrutiny that has attended his public remarks since he was picked as the Republican vice presidential candidate; Ryan has found himself in hot water even over innocuous details, like his recently debunked claims about his marathon running.
lead_paragraph: Representative Paul D. Ryan, the candidate for vice president, has learned that added scrutiny can turn even marathons and mountains into treacherous topics.

headline.seo: Paul Ryan Faces Scrutiny Over Marathon and Mountain Claims
headline.main: For Ryan, Perks of Joining Ticket Can Be Weighty
headline.print_headline: For Ryan, Perks Of Joining Ticket Can Be Weighty
